meanings.definition: A person or entity that owns property adjacent to another property.
meanings.sent1: The abutters next door have a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent2: The abutters on our street are friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The abutters decided to have a block party to get to know each other better.
meanings.sent4: The abutters' properties form a colorful mosaic of different styles.
meanings.sent5: The abutters' houses create a cozy community atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of abutting or being adjacent to something.
meanings.sent1: The abutters of the two fields meet at the corner.
meanings.sent2: The abutters of the park and the school enjoy the green space.
meanings.sent3: The abutters of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent4: The abutters of the river and the forest create a serene landscape.
meanings.sent5: The abutters of the buildings give a sense of closeness in the neighborhood.
